Accreditation.name: Accreditation
Accreditation.description: Represents the professional accreditations of a facility. For example, a joint commission accredits a facility as a general acute care hospital.

AccountId.description: Healthcare facility (Account) that this accreditation is associated with.

AccreditationRating.description: Rating system used by the accrediting body.

AccreditingBody.description: The organization that provided the accreditation.

EffectiveFrom.description: The date from which this accreditation is effective.

EffectiveTo.description: The date on which this accreditation is no longer effective.

HealthcareFacilityId.description: The healthcare facility associated with the accreditation.

LastFullSurveyDate.description: Date of the last full survey completed by accrediting body.

LastOnsiteSurveyDate.description: Date that accrediting body was last onsite.

LastReferencedDate.description: The timestamp for when the current user last viewed a record related to this record.

LastViewedDate.description: The timestamp for when the current user last viewed this record. If this value is null, itâ€™s possible that this record was referenced (LastReferencedDate) and not viewed.

OwnerId.description: The ID of the user who owns this record.

PractitionerId.description: Practitioner that this accreditation is associated with.

SourceSystem.description: System from which the record was sourced.

SourceSystemIdentifier.description: ID of the system from which the record was sourced.
